title: Frank Field – 2020 Comments on Jeremy Corbyn’s Suspension from the Labour Party
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Frank Field, the former Labour MP for Birkenhead, on 29 October 2020.
content:
Corbyn had me expelled from the Labour Party for objecting to thuggery and anti-Semitism. Now he knows what it’s like to have the party machine which one’s contributed to for decades to sling one out.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
  *[UCL]: University College London
  *[HIV]: human immunodeficiency virus
  *[AI]: artificial intelligence
